PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2005-08802005-05-12,  RC,  ,  , 
ActCanada Post Corporation Act
PrecisApproval of the appointment by the MInister of National Revenue of JEAN TURMEL of Outremont, Quebec, as a director of the Board of Directors of the Canada Post Corporation to hold office during pleasure for a term of three years, in the place of Michel Lemoine, whose term has expired.
AttachmentsAttachment
